item.title: Mind map
item.description: Mind map 🗒️ Description It is a note taking method for better brain engagement. When making a mind map, we engage not only the left, but also the right hemisphere of the brain, use spatial memory, build a system of associations, making it easier and faster to remember information and later reproduce it from memory.
